sentences.en: An unguarded remark let everyone know his secret.
sentences.cn: 他偶一出言不慎让大家都知道了他的秘密.

sentences.en: At no time can the entrance be left unguarded.
sentences.cn: 入口需要随时有人把守.

sentences.en: But at the moment of maximum peril the upper sky was unguarded.
sentences.cn: 然而在最最危急关头,高空中却一无戒备.

sentences.en: He was ambushed by a reporter into an unguarded comment.
sentences.cn: 他一不小心被记者套出话来。

sentences.en: He wondered if the psychiatrist was trying to goad him into some unguarded response.
sentences.cn: 他怀疑那位精神科医生试图刺激他作出一些本能的反应。

sentences.en: I should not leave my briefcase and camera bag unguarded.
sentences.cn: 我不该把我的公文包和相机包留在那儿无人看管。

sentences.en: In an unguarded moment he gave away the secret.
sentences.cn: 他一时没留神泄露了秘密.

sentences.en: In an unguarded moment, he gave away most important secrets.
sentences.cn: 他一不“留神”泄露了非常重要的秘密.

sentences.en: In an unguarded moment, he give away most important secrets.
sentences.cn: 他一不留神泄露了非常重要的秘密.

sentences.en: In an unguarded moment, she transferred all her property to her children.
sentences.cn: 她一时疏忽, 竟把她的全部财产转移给她的子女们了.

sentences.en: She let the news slip by mistake , in an unguarded moment.
sentences.cn: 她一不留神泄漏了消息.

sentences.en: The museum was unguarded at night.
sentences.cn: 这个博物馆夜里无人看守。

sentences.en: The photographers managed to capture Jane in an unguarded moment.
sentences.cn: 摄影师抓拍到了简不经意的瞬间。

sentences.en: These thieves specialize in stealing unguarded bikes.
sentences.cn: 这些小偷专门偷小区里没人看管的自行车.

sentences.en: They could not leave the city unguarded.
sentences.cn: 他们不能让这座城市不设防.

trans.tran_cn: 无防卫的，无人守护的，粗心的，不留神的
trans.tran_en: not guarded or protected by anyone
